description: The Lenovo Legion 5 is a powerful gaming laptop. It's equipped with an AMD Ryzen 7 CPU and 16GB of DDR4 RAM for smooth gaming performance. The 15.6-inch Full HD display with a 144Hz refresh rate offers fast and vibrant visuals. With a 512GB SSD, it ensures quick game loading and multitasking.

The Lenovo IdeaPad L340 is a budget-friendly gaming laptop. It's powered by an Intel Core i5 CPU and 8GB of DDR4 RAM for decent gaming performance. The 15.6-inch Full HD IPS display provides clear visuals. With dual storage options (256GB SSD + 1TB HDD), it offers ample space for games and files.

The Lenovo Legion 7 is a premium gaming laptop for serious gamers. It's powered by an Intel Core i9 CPU and boasts 32GB of DDR4 RAM for superior gaming performance. The 17.3-inch QHD display with a 165Hz refresh rate offers stunning visuals. With a fast 1TB SSD, it ensures quick game loading and multitasking.
